sources.title: IBM watsonx.ai Foundation Models API Documentation
sources.synthesis: IBM watsonx.ai provides REST API for foundation models including granite-13b-chat-v2 with greedy decoding (temperature=0) for deterministic outputs. Requires project_id and IAM API key for authentication.
sources.relevance: Primary API documentation for LLM integration

sources.title: PyMuPDF (fitz) Documentation
sources.synthesis: PyMuPDF is a Python binding for MuPDF, a lightweight PDF renderer. The get_text() method extracts text from PDF pages with support for born-digital PDFs. Used by 10K+ projects for PDF text extraction.
sources.relevance: Primary library for PDF text extraction

sources.title: Apple Environmental Progress Report 2024
sources.synthesis: Apple publishes annual environmental progress reports with detailed ESG metrics including Scope 1/2/3 emissions, renewable energy percentage, water usage, and waste recycling. Reports are born-digital PDFs ~5-10MB.
sources.relevance: Primary authentic data source for testing

sources.title: Prompt Engineering for ESG Extraction
sources.synthesis: Research on LLM prompt engineering for information extraction shows structured prompts with explicit JSON schemas reduce hallucinations and improve extraction accuracy by 15-25% compared to free-form prompts.
sources.relevance: Validates prompt engineering approach for ESG metrics

sources.title: Microsoft Sustainability Reports
sources.synthesis: Microsoft publishes comprehensive sustainability reports with carbon negative commitments, renewable energy transitions, and detailed GHG emissions data. Useful for multi-company testing.
sources.relevance: Secondary authentic data source for validation

sources.title: Tesla Impact Report 2023
sources.synthesis: Tesla publishes annual impact reports focused on GHG emissions avoided through EV adoption, renewable energy deployment, and manufacturing sustainability metrics.
sources.relevance: Third authentic data source for robust testing

synthesis_summary: Phase 3B implements unstructured ESG extraction using IBM watsonx.ai granite-13b-chat-v2 for LLM-based metric extraction from sustainability PDFs. PyMuPDF handles text extraction from born-digital PDFs. Authentic testing uses real Apple, Microsoft, and Tesla sustainability reports with manually verified ground truth.
